title: Pope Francis’ Homily at Opening Mass of Synod on the Family (Australian Catholic Bishops Conference) ...
text: ( Source : Australian Catholic Bishops Conference ) 'This is God's dream for his beloved creation: to see it fulfilled in the loving union between a man and a woman, rejoicing in their shared journey, fruitful in their mutual gift of self.' At
